head.supplied: Saturday ¶ [30 March 1889] ¶ ¶ As I am so extraordinarily busy in my Department, dear Mr Macdonald, in my Department. I shall probably not have leisure to call (even on a Sunday) on Mr Caldwell, eve...

div.p: A38 Royal Geographical Society of Australasia (Vic. Branch), Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

To proof.
Saturday [30 March 1889]
editorial addition, date deduced from position of MS in sequence of letter book.

As I am so extraordinarily busy in my Department, dear Mr Macdonald, in my Department. I shall probably not have leisure to call (even on a Sunday) on Mr Caldwell, even if I knew his adress. Could you kindly induce him, to call on me? He could easily come out by the St Kilda omnibus, which almost passes my door. Perhaps we could hold a Council meeting, so as to discuss "in pleno" geographic questions with him.
